languages.text: "Лопастью отрезало. Угодила под облаву блюстителей, пришлось драпать через вентиляцию. Путь раньше надежный был, мы там вентиль закоротили когда-то. Так эти подонки о нем прознали и запустили. Всех в фарш изрубило, а мне вот свезло". {n}Ризза безрадостно хлопает по протезу.{/n} "В тот день я уяснила, что война с Чорда — больше не моя война".

traits.locale_text: "Лопастью отрезало. Угодила под облаву блюстителей, пришлось драпать через вентиляцию. Путь раньше надежный был, мы там вентиль закоротили когда-то. Так эти подонки о нем прознали и запустили. Всех в фарш изрубило, а мне вот свезло". {n}Ризза безрадостно хлопает по протезу.{/n} "В тот день я уяснила, что война с Чорда — больше не моя война".
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."
languages.original_text: "Лопастью отрезало. Угодила под облаву блюстителей, пришлось драпать через вентиляцию. Путь раньше надежный был, мы там вентиль закоротили когда-то. Так эти подонки о нем прознали и запустили. Всех в фарш изрубило, а мне вот свезло". {n}Ризза безрадостно хлопает по протезу.{/n} "В тот день я уяснила, что война с Чорда — больше не моя война".

Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “被扇叶切掉了。那群执法者袭击了我们，我不得不从通风井逃跑。那条逃生通道原本很可靠，我们之前把风扇的电路切断了。可那群混蛋不知道什么时候发现了，又把风扇修好了。于是所有人都被切成了肉泥，而我运气还不错。”{n}莱萨拍着她的假肢，神情阴郁。{/n}“就在那天，我意识到，和库尔达之间的这场战争，我怕是再也打不了了。”
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

traits.locale_text: “被扇叶切掉了。那群执法者袭击了我们，我不得不从通风井逃跑。那条逃生通道很可靠，我们之前把风扇的电路切断了。可那群混蛋不知道什么时候发现了，又把风扇修好了。于是所有人都被切成了肉泥，而我运气还不错。”{n}莱萨拍着她的假肢，神情阴郁。{/n}“就在那天，我意识到，和库尔达之间的这场战争，我怕是再也打不了了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「ファンの羽根で切り落とされたんですよ。エンフォーサーの襲撃があって、換気シャフトから逃げようとしてね。以前は使える逃げ道だったんですよ。かなり前にファンをショートさせてありました。でも、あいつらにそれを勘繰られ、勝手にファンを付けられてしまったってわけです。お陰で全員ひき肉になって、私は運よく逃げ切りました」{n}リザは不機嫌な表情で義足を撫でた。{/n}「その日、チョーダとの戦争は、もはや私の戦争ではないんだと気づかされました」
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「ファンの羽根で切り落とされたんですよ。エンフォーサーの襲撃があって、換気シャフトから逃げようとしてね。以前は使える逃げ道だったんですよ。かなり前にファンをショートさせてありました。でも、あいつらにそれを勘繰られ、勝手にファンを付けられてしまったってわけです。お陰で全員ひき肉になって、私は運よく逃げ切りました」{n}リザは不機嫌な表情で義足を撫でた。{/n}「その日、チョーダとの戦争は、もはや私の戦争ではないんだと気づかされました」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Me lo arrancó un aspa de ventilador. Hubo un asalto y tuve que usar el conducto de ventilación. Solía ser una ruta de escape fiable. Provocamos un cortocircuito en el ventilador hace un tiempo. Esos capullos los descubrieron y lo hicieron funcionar de nuevo. Todos quedaron echos picadillo, yo tuve suerte». {n}Ryzza acaricia su prótesis con pena.{/n} «Ese fue el día en el que me di cuenta de que la guerra contra Chorda ya no era mi guerra».
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Me lo arrancó un aspa de ventilador. Hubo un asalto y tuve que usar el conducto de ventilación. Solía ser una ruta de escape fiable. Provocamos un cortocircuito en el ventilador hace un tiempo. Esos capullos los descubrieron y lo hicieron funcionar de nuevo. Todos quedaron echos picadillo, yo tuve suerte». {n}Ryzza acaricia su prótesis con pena.{/n} «Ese fue el día en el que me di cuenta de que la guerra contra Chorda ya no era mi guerra».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Wurde von einem Ventilator abgehackt. Es gab eine Enforcer-Razzia und ich musste den Lüftungsschacht nehmen. War früher mal eine zuverlässige Fluchtroute. Wir hatten den Ventilator kurz davor kurzgeschlossen. Aber die Bastarde haben das gemerkt und ihn repariert. Es wurden alle zu Hackfleisch verarbeitet, ich hatte noch Glück." {n}Ryzza klopft sich freudlos auf die Prothese.{/n} "An dem Tag ist mir klargeworden, dass der Krieg gegen Chorda nicht mehr mein Krieg war."
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Wurde von einem Ventilator abgehackt. Es gab eine Enforcer-Razzia und ich musste den Lüftungsschacht nehmen. War früher mal eine zuverlässige Fluchtroute. Wir hatten den Ventilator vor einer Weile kurzgeschlossen. Aber die Bastarde haben das gemerkt und ihn repariert. Es wurden alle zu Hackfleisch verarbeitet, ich hatte noch Glück." {n}Ryzza klopft sich freudlos auf die Prothese.{/n} "An dem Tag ist mir klargeworden, dass der Krieg gegen Chorda nicht mehr mein Krieg war."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Tranchée par une pale de ventilateur. Un jour, j'ai dû fuir par les conduits d'aération lors d'une descente des prévôts. On avait court-circuité le ventilateur, donc c'était censé être un chemin fiable, mais ces salopards l'ont découvert et ils l'ont remis en marche. Tout le monde s'est fait réduire en charpie, sauf moi... J'ai eu de la chance, {n}dit-elle en tapotant sa prothèse d'un air morne.{/n} Ce jour-là, j'ai compris que la guerre contre Chorda ne me concernait plus. »
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Tranchée par une pale de ventilateur. Un jour, j'ai dû fuir par les conduits d'aération lors d'une descente des prévôts. On avait court-circuité le ventilateur, donc c'était censé être un chemin fiable, mais ces salopards l'ont découvert et ils l'ont remis en marche. Tout le monde s'est fait réduire en charpie, sauf moi... J'ai eu de la chance, {n}dit-elle en tapotant sa prothèse d'un air morne.{/n} Ce jour-là, j'ai compris que la guerre contre Chorda ne me concernait plus. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Pervane kanadına kaptırdım. İnfazcılar baskın yapmıştı, havalandırmadan kaçmak zorunda kaldım. Daha evvel kullandığım, işe yarar bir yöntemdi. Pervaneye de kısa devre yaptırmıştık. Şerefsizler bunu anlayınca pervaneyi çalıştırdı tabii. Herkes kıyma gibi kıyıldı, bense şanslıydım. {n}Ryzza, keyifsizce protezini okşuyor.{/n} "Chorda'yla mücadele etmenin bana düşmediğini o gün anladım."
languages.original_text: "Got lopped off by a fan blade. There was an enforcer raid and I had to take the ventilation shaft. It used to be a reliable escape route. We'd shorted the fan a while before. Well, the bastards found out about it, and got it working again. Everyone got turned into mincemeat, and I was lucky." {n}Ryzza pats her prosthetic joylessly.{/n} "That was the day I realised the war on Chorda wasn't my war anymore."

Pervaneye de kısa devre yaptırmıştık. Şerefsizler bunu anlayınca pervaneyi çalıştırdı tabii. Herkes kıyma gibi kıyıldı, bense şanslıydım. {n}Ryzza keyifsizce protezini okşuyor.{/n} "Chorda'yla mücadele etmenin bana düşmediğini o gün anladım."
